document.full_text: the first playstation phone, sony ericsson's xperia play, is not affected by the massive data breach of playstation user accounts, the phone maker said on thursday.
document.title: first playstation phone not hit by data breach
lines_and_colors: the first playstation phone, sony ericsson's xperia play, is not affected by the massive data breach of playstation user accounts, the phone maker said on thursday.
